DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to determine whether tailored internet-administrated CBT is a feasible approach in the treatment of panic symptoms and comorbid anxiety and depressive symptoms.
DOC.brief_title: Tailored Internet-administrated Treatment of Panic Symptoms - A Randomised Controlled Trial
DOC.criteria: Be between the ages of 1830 years old or 3146 years old Have reoccurring panic attacks Suicide prone Alcohol addiction PTSD OCD Ongoing psychological treatment
